thread.title: Sevilla 2 Leicester 1 – five things we learnt: Christian Fuchs needs a kick up the backside, Ahmed Musa won’t muck in and Kasper Schmeichel is too good
thread.title_full: Sevilla 2 Leicester 1 – five things we learnt: Christian Fuchs needs a kick up the backside, Ahmed Musa won’t muck in and Kasper Schmeichel is too good

author: jhutchinson
title: Sevilla 2 Leicester 1 – five things we learnt: Christian Fuchs needs a kick up the backside, Ahmed Musa won’t muck in and Kasper Schmeichel is too good
text:
EFL FOXES HAVE LIFELINE Sevilla 2 Leicester 1 – five things we learnt: Christian Fuchs needs a kick up the backside, Ahmed Musa won’t muck in and Kasper Schmeichel is too good 
Leicester gave themselves a fighting chance thanks to Jamie Vardy's second half away goal, but they were lucky to lose by just one goal by JOHN HUTCHINSON
